CustomField.formula: IF( (Charge_Labour__c == 0) ,"", 'GBP ' & TEXT(Charge_Labour__c) &BR() )& IF( (Charge_List_Price_Services__c == 0) ,"", 'GBP ' & TEXT(Charge_List_Price_Services__c) &BR() )& IF( (Charge_Discount_Total__c == 0) ,"", '- ' & 'GBP ' & TEXT(Charge_Discount_Total__c) &BR() &BR() )& IF( (Charge_Materials_Total__c == 0) ,"", 'GBP ' & TEXT(Charge_Materials_Total__c) &BR() )& IF( (Charge_Call_Out__c == 0) ,"", 'GBP ' & TEXT(Charge_Call_Out__c) &BR() )& IF( (Charge_ULEZ__c == 0) ,"", 'GBP ' & TEXT(Charge_ULEZ__c) &BR() )& IF( (Charge_Collection_Fee__c == 0) ,"", 'GBP ' & TEXT(Charge_Collection_Fee__c) &BR() )& IF( (Charge_Other_Item__c == 0 ) ,"", 'GBP ' & TEXT(Charge_Other_Item__c) &BR() )& IF( (Fixed_Price_Admin_Fee__c == 0 ) ,"", 'GBP ' & TEXT(Fixed_Price_Admin_Fee__c) &BR() )
CustomField.label: T1B
